name: 勞維俊
objective: 本課程主要在培養各類型段落、短文的撰寫能力，包括描寫、敘述、說明及議論性質文章。
schedule:
Course Aims:

This course aims to train students’ ability of starting a research project, from setting a thesis statement to finishing a research proposal. 

Course Outline:

Week	Class Task / Activities 	(Assignment)

1	Introduction					
2	Argument and Logic
3	Thesis statement 
4	Thesis statement		(1-page free writing due)
5	Title
6	Title
7	Library visit (NTU)
8	Topic sentence		(Mid-term draft due)

9	(Mid-term Essay due)

10	International conference (no class)
11	Style: Clarity 
12	Style: Clarity			
13	Style: Clarity
14	Proposal		
15	Proposal		
16	Presentation			(Final Essay draft due)
17	Presentation

18	(Final Essay due) 


Course requirements: 
Students are required to 	
(1)	write a mid-term paper, around 2-3 pages;
(2)	write a project proposal, around 3-4 pages in MLA or APA style;     
(3) 	give presentations on a chosen topic agreed with the instructor; 
(4) 	evaluate and edit their peers’ writings.
scorePolicy:
Assessments:
Attendance: 		10% 
Presentations: 	20%
Mid-term essay: 	30% (10% + 20%)
Final essay:  		40% (20% + 20%)

NOTE: Please make sure your works are original and contain no unacknowledged materials. Plagiarism is an offense in the academic field, and NTUT takes it very seriously. The minimum penalty for plagiarism is a straight Fail in the course and the case may be passed on to the university for record.
